description._content: Image taken from: Title: "An Oration on the Annals of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations, by ... F. V. and a Rhyme of Rhode Island and the times, by G. W. Curtis, delivered before the Sons of Rhode Island, in New York, May 29, 1863. L.P" Author: VINTON, Francis. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9603.ee.14." Page: 86 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1864 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003800235 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
